# SSIV

## Agregating data

```{r}
ssiv <- cross_join(
  shares_by_amc,
  china_shock
  ) |>
  # calculate ssiv
  mutate(
    ssiv = share * psi * x
  )
```

```{r}
bulk_write_rds(ssiv)
```
